content.question: During the 1800s the most common form of resistance to slavery by slaves themselves was

choices.label: rebelling openly, using weapons, and planning confrontations
organizing petitions and demonstrations against slavery
escaping to Canada via the Underground Railroad
cooperating with the abolitionist movement to advocate laws to end slavery

topic.text: 4.12: African Americans in the Early Republic

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
